text: The Burkina Faso national under-17 football team represents Burkina Faso in youth international football. They have been to the FIFA U-17 World Cup five times with their best resulting coming in 2001 where they finished third the completion. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA U-17 World Cup record=== FIFA
